tool_description: An API that converts Vue 2.x with Options API to Vue 3 with the Composition API
name: Vue2-to-Vue3-converter
title: Vue2-to-Vue3-converter

api_list.name: Check length validity of Vue file
api_list.description:
This API has a size limit for Vue files.
extremely large components with way more than 600 lines won't be supported. This endpoint is free and you can check the validity of a your Vue file before wasting an API call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vue2-to-vue3-converter.p.rapidapi.com/check-component-validity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vue2-to-vue3-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Vue 2 file to Vue 3
api_list.description: Through this endpoint a Vue 2 file can be converted to a Vue 3 file.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vue2-to-vue3-converter.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vue2-to-vue3-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
